content:
In the document "eCR Now App Configuration Guide", it states, "3. The COVID flag vs Full eCR Reporting is to be used to report on COVID only or full eCR.
a. For now the App only performs COVID reporting."
Is this still the case?
The App can do either COVID reporting or Full ECR reporting.

Thanks, Dragon - from the programmatic perspective, I will add that all vendors/health IT products are being encouraged to endeavor support of all conditions supported within the eRSD, not solely COVID-19, from this point forward.
